questions.question: Changing the port order on your FeatureJoiner cleans up your connection lines. However, what is a potentially negative result of taking this action?
options: Experienced FME users will expect ports to be in a particular location.
The Crime feature type has to be below the PostalAddress feature type on the canvas.

questions.question: Which of these options would be the best annotation for the AttributeValueMapper transformer?
options: Assign each crime a number based on severity.
Here I mapped some of the crime attributes to accomplish the walkability score goal of the workspace in the context of this section.

questions.question: Why might you choose the preset brown Readers/Writers color for your bookmarks containing readers, writers, and FeatureReaders/FeatureWriters?
options: It matches the color of transformers.
Brown is a color naturally associated with reading and writing.
It is quick to see at a glance the location of your readers or writers.

questions.question: If you add and collapse a bookmark after the FeatureJoiner containing the next three transformers, how many features come out of the CenterPointReplacer : Point port?
